title: Create a matrix input field — matrixInput
text: Use function create matrix input field. Typically `ui.R` file shiny application. can access input via `input$inputId` server function shiny application. value always matrix contain values class `class`.

title: Create a matrix input field — matrixInput
code: matrixInput(   inputId,   label = NULL,   value = matrix("", 1, 1),   inputClass = "",   rows = list(),   cols = list(),   cells = list(),   class = "character",   paste = FALSE,   copy = FALSE,   copyDoubleClick = FALSE,   pagination = FALSE,   lazy = FALSE )

title: Create a matrix input field — matrixInput
text: inputId input slot used access value label label input field value Initial value. matrix inputClass class matrix input html element rows list options configure rows cols list options configure cols cells list options configure cells class Matrix coerced matrix class. `character` `numeric` supported paste old argument copy old argument copyDoubleClick old argument pagination Use pagination display matrix lazy lazy updating server values. new values sent server input field visible

title: Create a matrix input field — matrixInput
text: parameters `rows` `cols` take list arguments. Currently, following arguments supported: n number rows (calculated value default) names row/colnames displayed? names taken value editableNames row/colnames editable extend matrix extended data entered last row/column? delta many blank rows/cols added? createHeader, updateHeader name javascript function override default function create/update table header. function needs table element data object argument getHeader createHeader table element argument Similarly, parameter `cells` takes list arguments: editableCells logical, cells editable (default `TRUE`)

title: Create a matrix input field — matrixInput
code:
matrixInput( "myMatrix", value = diag(3), rows = list(names = FALSE), cols = list(names = FALSE), cells = list(editableCells = FALSE) ) #>
